top.title: Trump says government will 'de-escalate' in Minnesota following Pretti shooting
top.summary: The killing of Alex Pretti over the weekend led MInnesota officials and locals to renew calls for Trump to end his immigration operation there.

top.title: Who is Tom Homan, Trump's 'border tsar' deployed to Minneapolis?
top.summary: The US border tsar has long been a ferocious defender of Donald Trump's immigration policies.

top.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
top.summary: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.

top.title: Pornhub to restrict access for UK users from next week
top.summary: The changes mean only those who have a Pornhub account and have verified their age will be able to access it in the UK soon.

top.title: TikTok US pushes back on claims it is censoring content
top.summary: Thousands of people claim political content is being suppressed after the US operation was spun off.

top.title: AI boom will produce victors and carnage, tech boss warns
top.summary: Cisco chief executive Chuck Robbins compares AI to the dotcom bubble of the early 2000s.

title.#text: The crypto bill is falling apart in Congress
Meta is spending millions to convince people that data centers are cool and you like them
